rules_text:
{W}{U}, Return an unblocked attacking creature you control to its owner’s hand: Put this creature from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deals combat damage to a player, reveal that many cards from the top card of your library. Put one of them into your hand and you gain life equal to that card’s mana value. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
